amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 116-61 to add areas with high concentrations of unemployment to the list where such outreach and educational activities shall be provided.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cox (CA) amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Cox (CA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cox (CA) amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
